channel.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to Zailyx RS!
We are still in the early stages of our LIVE release, so expect some content to be semi-unavailable as the week progresses.
If you find a bug and would like to report it, please use the link below. [url=http://zailyxrs.com/forums/index.php?/forum/20-report-a-glitchbug/]http://zailyxrs.com/forums/index.php?/forum/20-report-a-glitchbug/[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lt6dUz8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/E0Wgvh0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PdyJwTX.png[/img][/center]
Update 3/14/2015: [code]Added a better timer for thieving stalls to stop spam clicking New starter Tutorial almost completed Fixed a bug with Nex that was causing the controller to start randomly after leaving Added a new set of training locations for varied levels Highscores page updated New PvM ticket system to access certain high-profit areas Added in new PvM Ticket system Added PvM artifacts (3 seperate tiers) that can be exchanged for pvm tickets, gear or gold Fixed a Login issue that was causing players to have to login twice sometimes Fixed a few disconnection issues Finishing up rewriting following system to make players actually follow right behind Added in several new boss pets Added noted ores, bones and logs to shops to make for ease of purchase Added a better trivia system Shooting Stars have been added Added Artifacts to several boss monsters and many slayer monsters Changed around the setup of several shops at home and at the donators zone More stability work done Fixed a problem where the client was dropping packets (mem leak)[/code]
[center][url=http://www.zailyxrs.com/forums/]Forums[/url] [url=http://www.zailyxrs.com/webclient.html] Webclient[/url] [url=http://www.zailyxrs.com/ZX%20Launch.jar]Download Client[/url] [url=http://www.zailyxrs.com/highscores/]Highscores[/url][/center]
[center]Update Log: [code]Fixed item bonuses and repacked a lot of items Fixed a few memory leaks - many more to go Added snow texture for the duration of the winter months Dungeoneering (10%) Completionist Cape and Requirements Highscores PKing and PvM Loving Community Full Farming Custom bosses including dungoneering bosses Custom quests Full Slayer All Chaotics and Drygores Weekly lottery winners Key + Chest system Squeal of Fortune Nearly flawless skilling system Balanced and fair economy Lots of things to do Lots of Teleports 100% Soul Wars 100% Castle Wars Titles Nex Over 20+ bosses Weekly Updates
More to come soon...[/code][/center]
Below is some Media for the server --
We hope to see you on soon! Regards, Zailyx
[center][size=14pt]Zailyx RS is a new server backed by a highly experienced development team. We are still in the infancy stage of our release and hope to be integrating new content into the server over the next few weeks. Zailyx is an ECONOMY based server, with no shortage of things to do. Zailyx supports all types of players from PvM Oriented to Hybrid players, and even you blood thirsty die-hard PKers.
Zailyx has everything you could want in a server and more. We hope to see you on soon![/size]
Website: http://www.zailyxrs.com/forums/ Webclient: http://www.zailyxrs.com/webclient.html Client Link: http://www.zailyxrs.com/ZX%20Launch.jar Highscores: http://www.zailyxrs.com/highscores/
Media - [img]http://www.zailyxrs.com/images/zxad.png[/img] [img]http://www.zailyxrs.com/images/Dice.png[/img][img]http://www.zailyxrs.com/images/120%20capes.png[/img][img]http://www.zailyxrs.com/images/drygore.png[/img][/center]

item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Update 3/14/2015:

Added a better timer for thieving stalls to stop spam clicking New starter Tutorial almost completed Fixed a bug with Nex that was causing the controller to start randomly after leaving Added a new set of training locations for varied levels Highscores page updated New PvM ticket system to access certain high-profit areas Added in new PvM Ticket system Added PvM artifacts (3 seperate tiers) that can be exchanged for pvm tickets, gear or gold Fixed a Login issue that was causing players to have to login twice sometimes Fixed a few disconnection issues Finishing up rewriting following system to make players actually follow right behind Added in several new boss pets Added noted ores, bones and logs to shops to make for ease of purchase Added a better trivia system Shooting Stars have been added Added Artifacts to several boss monsters and many slayer monsters Changed around the setup of several shops at home and at the donators zone More stability work done Fixed a problem where the client was dropping packets (mem leak)

Read full topic

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Came back to check the updates.
I must say i quite enjoy the server now, earlier it seemed to be boring.

On a side note, i reported a bug to one of the admins (Penalis or something) which should be taken care of asap.
Goodluck with the server, and i’m sure i will play from time to time.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zailyx wrote:

I apologize for not having more time these past 2 weeks to update, it is mid terms week and my Master’s program is just eating up every second of my free time.

Mid’s are over and Live should be releasing on Sunday.

Read full topic

Added in Lootsharing today. I will be implementing a method for players to choose whether they want to split their loot via items or gold.

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Tried out the farming today, works pretty well. Only thing I would suggest is having it pick individually instead of just adding them to your inventory in 1 animation.

Read full topic
item.source: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Zailyx Zailyx
item.description:
@Zailyx wrote:

Thank you I appreciate it.
And you’re right, the only purpose of having this in the advertisements section right now, is so that I can have players help test content as it is added. Thank you for your input and support.

EDIT: update, started on a new farming base. Completely rewritten. Finished Allotments, Herb and Tree Patches.

Read full topic
item.source: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“Zailyx, post:6, topic:549537”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=668433.msg4471223#msg4471223 date=1423050290]
Not suprised.
[/quote]
At what? Another 718 server popping up?
Yeah, I’m not surprised either. The only real difference right now between my server, and ‘the rest’ - is the dedication that is going in to every little bit of this server. While the aesthetics may appear frighteningly similar to almost every other 718 loading whatever these days, most of the current work being put in is fixing problems that other servers just aren’t bothering to fix. Such as the memory leak with the cache, the constant nulls that rune-evo attempts to send, missing packets, etc etc.[/quote]

Hey man wasn’t meant to be fully negative.
But yeah you’re right about the fact that most work, isn’t seen because it mainly involves issue fixes and not actual content wise.
Either way wish you the best of luck, it’s just the fact that i’m not suprised as in what you offer.
The issue fixes are of course meant to be done, so i leave that to the side but beside that i’m just not suprised about your server as of now.

Looking forward on the future of your server, perhaps i’ll drop by to see how things are going.

Read full topic
item.source: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Zailyx Zailyx
item.description:
@Zailyx wrote:

wimstr:

Not suprised.

At what? Another 718 server popping up?
Yeah, I’m not surprised either. The only real difference right now between my server, and ‘the rest’ - is the dedication that is going in to every little bit of this server. While the aesthetics may appear frighteningly similar to almost every other 718 loading whatever these days, most of the current work being put in is fixing problems that other servers just aren’t bothering to fix. Such as the memory leak with the cache, the constant nulls that rune-evo attempts to send, missing packets, etc etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Eclipse639 Eclipse639
item.description:
@Eclipse639 wrote:

Looks decent. Content is relatively the same as a lot of the 718’s out these days, but it seems like a lot of the normal bugs have been fixed.
The gameplay also seems to be a lot smoother than most, I can definitely tell you’ve put work into the servers performance.

Good luck with this

Read full topic
item.source: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Zailyx Zailyx
item.description:
@Zailyx wrote:

Highscores have been added. Forum integration will be up tonight after I return home from class.
Forums have been vamped up a little, haven’t had much time the past few days unfortunately. Much more to come over the next few days.

Read full topic

item.title: Zailyx RS [718] -- Now LIVE -- GE -- Farming -- Join Today
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Should have at least done some little work to the forums before releasing some advertisement thread. All it looks like that has been done were the boards. You want to make sure a first impression is the absolute best otherwise it’s hard showing the best - otherwise.

Read full topic

[center]Welcome to Zailyx RS!

We are still in the early stages of our LIVE release, so expect some content to be semi-unavailable as the week progresses.

If you find a bug and would like to report it, please use the link below.
http://zailyxrs.com/forums/index.php?/forum/20-report-a-glitchbug/


[/center]

Update 3/14/2015:

Added a better timer for thieving stalls to stop spam clicking New starter Tutorial almost completed Fixed a bug with Nex that was causing the controller to start randomly after leaving Added a new set of training locations for varied levels Highscores page updated New PvM ticket system to access certain high-profit areas Added in new PvM Ticket system Added PvM artifacts (3 seperate tiers) that can be exchanged for pvm tickets, gear or gold Fixed a Login issue that was causing players to have to login twice sometimes Fixed a few disconnection issues Finishing up rewriting following system to make players actually follow right behind Added in several new boss pets Added noted ores, bones and logs to shops to make for ease of purchase Added a better trivia system Shooting Stars have been added Added Artifacts to several boss monsters and many slayer monsters Changed around the setup of several shops at home and at the donators zone More stability work done Fixed a problem where the client was dropping packets (mem leak)

Webclient
Download Client

[code]Fixed item bonuses and repacked a lot of items

Added snow texture for the duration of the winter months
